description:
Choji and Naruto is craving Ichiraku`s special ramen only to find out that they find the shop closed! Teuchi reveals that his daughter has been kidnapped by Ryonin, aka the Ninja Chefs, who is after his secret recipes!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Brûlons les graisses ! Mélangeons, étirons, et à la cuisson !
Burn Zundou! Mix, Stretch and Boil It Up!
Moero Zundou! Mazete Nobajite Yude Agero!!
ส่วยไปให้มันส์ ผสม ยืด เอาให้เดือดพล่าน
燃えろ寸胴! 混ぜて伸ばして茹で上げろ!!
